name: @dra2020/fn-layer
description: AWS Lambda function for occaasional full patch runs on map database.

scripts.prezip: npm prune --production && rm -f deploy.zip && rm -rf node_modules/aws-sdk && mkdir nodejs && mv package-lock.json node_modules nodejs
scripts.fullzip: npm run prezip && npm run ziponly && npm run postzip
scripts.awsdeploy12: aws lambda publish-layer-version --layer-name dralayer12 --compatible-runtimes nodejs12.x --zip-file fileb://deploy.zip
scripts.awsdeploy14: aws lambda publish-layer-version --layer-name dralayer14 --compatible-runtimes nodejs14.x --zip-file fileb://deploy.zip
scripts.awsdeploy16: aws lambda publish-layer-version --layer-name dralayer16 --compatible-runtimes nodejs16.x --zip-file fileb://deploy.zip
scripts.awsdeploy18: aws lambda publish-layer-version --layer-name dralayer18 --compatible-runtimes nodejs18.x --zip-file fileb://deploy.zip
scripts.fulldeploy12: npm run fullzip && npm run awsdeploy12
scripts.fulldeploy14: npm run fullzip && npm run awsdeploy14
scripts.fulldeploy16: npm run fullzip && npm run awsdeploy16
scripts.fulldeploy18: npm run fullzip && npm run awsdeploy18

author: Terry Crowley
